title: Vlad in Low Elo
body:
I've been playing vlad for a bit and what i noticed in low elo, it is nearly impossible to fuck up on Vlad and not 1v5 by the 30 minute mark (assuming you know how to functionally play him). Pick this champ up and play him mid or top to get freelo
https://imgur.com/a/DzZkstE      {{champion:8}}

replies.body: Well obviously. No one in low elo knows what grievous wounds is.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=loEXi9ae,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-07T01:56:06.506+0000)
>
> Well obviously. No one in low elo knows what grievous wounds is.

No most of the time they built morellos, but with visage it's 15% less heals instead of 40%

hi
idk if sanguin pool cast animation fizzles permastuns ? does he get caught with stuns in those frames?


goodday

ah, almost forgot
old days you could sanguin pool thru down turrets, dont know if its still a thing or if they nerfed it.
no one knows what executioners culling or mortal reminder is.

Grevious wounds doesn't exactly shut down vlad that hard.

Vlads power is in his burst. You want to shut down vlad you need to build MR.

I was once beat by a syndra who built a executioners calling first item.

yeah.
but if you can shut down vlad early, his late game will be weaker.

Vlad is good in low elo for two reasons.

1. Nobody respects Emp Q in lane.

2. They do not respect your presence in mid game team fights.

As you climb higher more skilled players will actually respect your emp Q and they will for sure be aware of your presence come mid game.

Also that spirit visage you build makes me want to puke no offense. I would replace it with morello. You will thank me later.
